item.title: New Evangelion series by NieR creator Yoko Taro announced
item.content:encoded:
A brand-new Evangelion series written by NieR series creator Yoko Taro and scored by NieR composer Keiichi Okabe is currently in production, animation studios Studio Khara and CloverWorks announced on the final day of the “Evangelion:30+; 30th Anniversary of Evangelion” festival today.

The series’ staff includes:

  • Series Composition and Script: Yoko Taro
  • Director: Kazuya Tsurumaki, Toko Yatabe
  • Composer: Keiichi Okabe
  • Production: Studio Khara x CloverWorks

Further information was not announced.
